templates.stem: Simplify ({a} + {b}i) + ({c} + {d}i).
Find the dot product of <{a},{b}> and <{c},{d}>.
Find the angle between <{a},{b}> and <{c},{d}> to the nearest degree.
Find the determinant of the matrix [[{a},{b}],[{c},{d}]]
templates.hint: A + B (same dimensions): add corresponding entries

templates.stem: Calculate the dot product <{a},{b}> ┬╖ <{c},{d}>

skills.name: Find terms of a recursive sequence

templates.stem: A sequence is defined by T(1) = {t1}, T(n) = {a}┬╖T(n-1) + {b} for n ΓëÑ 2. Find T({n}).
Simplify log({a}) + log({b}) where the logarithm has the same base
A particle moves according to s(t) = {a}t^2 + {b}t + {c}. Find its velocity at t = {t}.
Multiply matrices [[{a},{b}],[{c},{d}]] * [[{e},{f}],[{g},{h}]]
Find the determinant of [[{a},{b}],[{c},{d}]]
Find the inverse of [[{a},{b}],[{c},{d}]]
Integrate ∫({a}x^2 + {b}x + {c}) dx
Evaluate ∫ from {lower} to {upper} of {a}x dx
Find ∫{a}x^{n} dx
Find stationary points of f(x) = {a}x^2 + {b}x + {c}
A particle's position is s(t) = {a}t^2 + {b}t. Find velocity at t = {t0}
Vector A = <{a},{b}>, B = <{c},{d}>. Find A + B
Find the magnitude of vector <{a},{b}>
Find dot product of <{a},{b}> · <{c},{d}>
Find {k} * <{a},{b}>
Write equation of circle center ({h},{k}), radius {r}
Given regression line y = {a}x + {b}, predict y when x = {x0}
A biased coin has P(heads) = {p}. What is the probability of getting exactly {k} heads in {n} flips? (Round to 2 decimal places)
Use the factor theorem to determine if (x - {a}) is a factor of x^3 + {b}x^2 + {c}x + {d}

skills.name: Complex Conjugates Arg
skills.description: Practice problems for Complex Conjugates Arg.

templates.stem: Given |z| = {r} and arg(z) = {angle}π, which is z in rectangular form?
templates.hint: z = r(cos(θπ) + i sin(θπ)). Evaluate cos and sin at the given angle.

templates.stem: Calculate the determinant of the 2×2 matrix [[{a}, {b}], [{c}, {d}]]. (det = ad - bc)
For the matrix A = [[{a}, {b}], [{c}, {d}]], calculate: 2×determinant + trace. (Where trace = sum of diagonal)

skills.name: Geometry Circle Theorems
skills.description: Practice problems for Geometry Circle Theorems.

templates.stem: A chord subtends an angle of {theta}° at the centre. Find the angle subtended at the circumference.
templates.hint: Angle at circumference is half the angle at centre.

templates.stem: A tangent and chord form an angle of {alpha}°. Find the angle in the alternate segment.
templates.hint: Tangent-chord theorem: angle = angle in alternate segment.

templates.stem: The least-squares regression line is y = {a}x + {b}. What does the gradient {a} mean?
choices: For each increase of 1 in x, y increases by {a} (on average)
For each increase of 1 in y, x increases by {a}
templates.hint: Gradient = average change in y per unit increase in x.

skills.name: Matrices Mult Det3
skills.description: Practice problems for Matrices Mult Det3.

templates.stem: For a 3×3 matrix with first row [1, {a}, {b}], second row [0, {c}, {d}], third row [{e}, {f}, 2], the determinant = 1*(c*2-d*f) - a*(0-d*{e}) + {b}*(0-c*{e}). Calculate the determinant.
For matrices A = [[{a}, {b}], [{c}, {d}]] and B = [[{e}, {f}], [{g}, {h}]], what is element [1,1] of A×B? (Element [1,1] = row1·col1 = a*e + b*g)
Find k such that v + k*u is perpendicular to u, given u = ({a},{b}) and v = ({c},{d}). (Perpendicular means dot product = 0)
templates.hint: Dot product = 0 → k(a c + b d) = 0.

templates.stem: For the fraction ({a}x^2 + {b}x + {c}) / ({d}x^2 + {e}x + {f}), what is the GCD of the numerator coefficients {a}, {b}, {c}?
templates.hint: Find the greatest common divisor of {a}, {b}, {c}.

templates.stem: What is the common denominator for: {a}/(x+{b}) + {c}/(x-{d}) = {e}?
templates.hint: Multiply the two denominators to find the common denominator.

skills.name: Log Properties Eq
skills.description: Practice problems for Log Properties Eq.

templates.stem: Simplify: log_2({a}) + log_2({b}) = log_2(x). Find x.
Solve: {a}^(log_base_{a}(x+{b})) = {c}
templates.hint: Take log base a of both sides.

skills.name: Exp Growth Interest
skills.description: Practice problems for Exp Growth Interest.

templates.stem: An investment grows at {r}% per year compounded annually. How many full years until it exceeds {target} times the initial amount?
templates.hint: A(1 + r/100)^n > target A → n > log(target)/log(1+r/100).

templates.stem: Find the value after {t} years of £{p} at {r}% p.a. compounded continuously.
templates.hint: A = P e^{rt} with r as decimal.

skills.name: Trig Exact Solve
skills.description: Practice problems for Trig Exact Solve.

templates.stem: Find all angles θ in 0° ≤ θ ≤ 360° where sin(θ) = {numerator}/{denominator}.
For an arithmetic sequence where u_n = {a} + ({b}-1)d, what is the common difference d = u_2 - u_1 = {b} - {a} = ?
Evaluate: sum from k=1 to {n} of ({a}k + {b}). (Use sum formulas: sum(k) = n(n+1)/2, sum(1) = n)

skills.name: Polynomials Factor Theorem
skills.description: Practice problems for Polynomials Factor Theorem.

templates.stem: Which quadratic factor results from dividing {a}x³ + {b}x² + {c}x + {d} by (x − {k})?
templates.hint: Use Factor Theorem: if (x − k) is a factor, then P(k) = 0. Apply synthetic division.

templates.stem: Find the value of k so that (x + {r}) is a factor of x³ + kx² + {c}x + {d}. (Use Factor Theorem: P({neg_r}) = 0)
templates.hint: Substitute x = {neg_r} into polynomial and solve for k: P({neg_r}) = 0

skills.name: Exponential Word Problems
skills.description: Practice problems for Exponential Word Problems.

templates.stem: A population grows according to P(t) = P₀ × {r}^t. How long (nearest year) to triple?
Radioactive substance decays at 4% per year. What percentage remains after {t} years?

skills.name: Rational Asymptotes Holes
skills.description: Practice problems for Rational Asymptotes Holes.

templates.stem: For f(x) = (x+{a})(x-{b}) / ((x+{a})(x-{c})), the hole is at x = ?
templates.hint: Cancelled factor → hole; remaining denominator → asymptote.

templates.stem: Find horizontal asymptote of f(x) = ({a}x^2 + {b}x + {c}) / ({d}x^2 + {e}x + {f}). (Same degree numerator/denominator: y = leading coeff ratio)
templates.hint: Same degree → ratio of leading coefficients.

templates.stem: X ~ N({mean}, {sd}²). Find P(X > {x_val}) to 3 decimal places. (Standardize: z = (X - mean) / sd)
templates.hint: z-score = ({x_val} - {mean}) / {sd}, then use normal CDF table

templates.stem: Evaluate: sum from k=1 to n of k^2, where n = {n}. (Use formula: n(n+1)(2n+1)/6)
templates.hint: Standard formula for sum of squares.

templates.stem: Write in sigma notation: {a} + {b} + {c} + … + {last}. (Arithmetic sequence with common difference {d})
choices: sum from k=0 to {num_terms-1} of ({a} + k*{d})
templates.hint: Arithmetic sequence: first term = {a}, common difference = {d}, num_terms = {num_terms}

templates.stem: Find the radius² of a circle with centre ({h},{k}) passing through ({p},{q}).
For the circle x² + y² + {d}x + {e}y + {f} = 0, find the centre x-coordinate. (Complete the square: x² + dx = (x + d/2)² - (d/2)²)
